title: Constant 400+ ping
body: For the past 2 days I'm getting a constant 400+ ping even though my internet is working properly. It's never happened before and is really pissing me off. Hope someone has a solution.

replies.body:
Huge increases in latency usually show up as a result of network routing changes to our servers by your ISP, resulting in a longer path to our servers. Before we take a look into your routing to our servers, I recommend going through our [**network configuration guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything on your local network has been set properly for League.

Let me know if you run into these issues again.
